actions.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
Amendment reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

description: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 208, the amendments printed in House Report 116-17 to the concurrent resolution and the preamble are considered adopted.
purpose: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 208, the amendments printed in House Report 116-17 to the concurrent resolution and the preamble are considered adopted.
